alert.note: Alert for Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LYCOMING COUNTY THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Montoursville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Montoursville around 235 PM EDT. Loyalsockville and Montgomery around 240 PM EDT. Muncy around 250 PM EDT. Hughesville around 255 PM EDT. Barbours around 300 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include South Williamsport, Garden View, Picture Rocks, Williamsport Airport and Little League World Series Complex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
